ANML has teamed with global appliance giant, Whirlpool to create a step by step cooking interface that connects to your kitchen appliances.

Yummly’s digital products helping the company grow from 5 million users to 50 million users leading to the acquisition by Whirlpool, a global appliance giant. ANML played key roles in defining the Yummly brand through our product work including, iOS, Android, Apple TV, and Apple Watch.
